modules.title: Network Security Principles
modules.content:
## Security Architecture

### Defense in Depth
Multiple layers of security.

### Key Principles
- Least privilege
- Segmentation
- Zero trust
- Fail secure

### Security Zones
- DMZ
- Internal
- Management
- Guest

modules.title: Network Segmentation
modules.content:
## Segmentation Strategies

### VLANs
Logical network separation.

### Micro-segmentation
Granular workload isolation.

### Best Practices
- Separate by function
- Limit lateral movement
- Control traffic flows
- Monitor cross-zone traffic

modules.title: Firewall Architecture
modules.content:
## Firewall Design

### Types
- Network firewalls
- Host-based
- Next-gen (NGFW)
- WAF

### Rule Design
```
# Default deny
Deny all

# Allow specific
Allow TCP 10.0.1.0/24 any 443
Allow TCP 10.0.1.0/24 10.0.2.0/24 22
```

### High Availability
- Active/Passive
- Active/Active

modules.title: Zero Trust Architecture
modules.content:
## Zero Trust Model

### Principles
- Never trust, always verify
- Least privilege access
- Assume breach
- Verify explicitly

### Components
- Identity verification
- Device health
- Micro-segmentation
- Continuous monitoring

modules.title: Secure Design Patterns
modules.content:
## Design Patterns

### Bastion Host
Hardened jump server.

### Proxy Servers
Intermediate for inspection.

### Load Balancers
- SSL termination
- DDoS protection
- Health checks

### Best Practices
- Encrypt in transit
- Centralized logging
- Regular audits
